Package marytts.tools.dbselection

Class Summary
CoverageDefinition Builds and manages the cover sets
DatabaseSelector Main class to be run over a database for selection
DBHandler Various functions for handling connection, inserting and querying a mysql database.
FeatureMaker Takes text and converts to features Needs a running Mary server
FeatureMakerMaryServer Takes text and converts to features Needs a running Mary server
MaryScriptCreator  
SelectionFunction Selects sentences from a given set using the greedy algorithm.
SortTestResults Sorts the test results according to the four coverage measures
SynthesisScriptGUI Simple Synthesis script GUI.
TestResult Represents the result of one test run
WikipediaDumpSplitter  
WikipediaMarkupCleaner WikipediaMarkupCleaner
WikipediaProcessor WikipediaProcessor This program processes one by one the xml files split with wikipediaDumpSplitter.
